WELCOME!

Hi! Welcome to JCC World. For now i am practicing and cracking the codes for one and decent webpage. Well anyway, WELCOME to my Official and under development or should i say a "beta" site! Click some links in the top for more info and stuffs! THANK YOU FOR VISITING!

ADMIN'S DIARY

from Admin (@jccultima123)
October 15, 2013

jccultima.phpnet.us will be down in a near future

I've discovered some alternative hosts for security conflicts in phpnet,
but it will be not a necessary for now. So after i transfer all files into a new web hosting, i will close my phpnet.us account sooner.
So please be updated, but if in case you are still visiting here (jccultima.phpnet.us)
it will redirect you to a new address.

About PHP, JQuery, Migrating to another domain and more Articles

PHP and Jquery will make more powerful than just an html, maybe i will
Learn it not for now but someday. I am discussing happenings and my opinions
all over the world. Maybe i will do it sooner. While this domain is now rejected
by social media sites and search engines because of spam issues.
because of that, jccultima.phpnet.us will be no longer to use it soon.
AND WAIT FOR NEW ADDRESS.

But if you are still accessing to this domain, starting August 2013, it will
redirected to a new domain.

from Admin (@jccultima123)
June 8, 2013

I've reported some page issues, and because of that,
JCC World Site will never use software Generated Software like Coffecup because of
Generating Container (CSS) via Images (which it can potentially slower Loading pages)
instead of Real CSS Style Code. Because of this, i will continue exploring new coding styles
and i've heard about HTML5, so i think i will do that in the future. My Search Engine is not
yet removed as a matter of fact, i added a Google Search Object but not here in my site.
